WAY OF THE HERO

Face adversity, manage your emotions & find inner peace

Learn the key principles of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, Mindfulness, Breathwork, Acceptance & Commitment Therapy & Stoic Wisdom.

TrailerExplore
Share

We take the best of therapeutic wisdom, ancient philosophy and coaching theory and package them into innovative self-development journeys.

Each bespoke Awake journey includes masterclass videos, guided meditations, workbook assignments and live webinars hosted by qualified experts.


Tell me more

Awake journey - the steps

We have created a unique four-part learning process. This journey of contemplation and discovery takes you from knowing to being, making the wisdom central of your everyday reality.
